data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Fax::DataFax - a module and its supporting modules to extract,
    process and interact with DataFax system - a fax based remote data
    capture system for clinical data management.

    Please see details about DataFax system at http://www.datafax.com/
    or participate in the discussion group in Yahoo at
    http://groups.yahoo.com/group/datafaxuserclub/

    Post message: datafaxuserclub@yahoogroups.com Subscribe:
    datafaxuserclub-subscribe@yahoogroups.com Unsubscribe:
    datafaxuserclub-unsubscribe@yahoogroups.com List owner:
    datafaxuserclub-owner@yahoogroups.com
